thread.title: Halberton youngsters get a lesson in politics thanks to Neil Parish MP - Devon Live

author: Lewis Clarke
title: Halberton youngsters get a lesson in politics thanks to Neil Parish MP - Devon Live
text:
Halberton youngsters get a lesson in politics thanks to Neil Parish MP Tiverton & Honiton MP Neil Parish visited pupils at Halberton Primary School on Friday, November 17 Share Tiverton & Honiton MP Neil Parish with youngsters from Halberton Primary School Share Get     
Youngsters in Halberton have been finding out about life as a Member of Parliament. 
Tiverton & Honiton MP Neil Parish visited pupils at Halberton Primary School on Friday, November 17 and was taken on a tour by the school council. He also gave a short talk to the children in Class Three followed by a question and answer session. Read More Devon MP urged to monitor 'free and fair' Zimbabwe elections by Boris Johnson 
Senior teacher, Christine Campion said: "Meeting Tiverton MP Neil Parish was a great opportunity for our pupils to find out more about Parliament and what the job of an MP is like. 
â€œI was impressed by the range of pertinent questions our children asked, particularly regarding Brexit, school funding and votes for 16-year-olds. They now have a better understanding of how our country is run, and I hope this inspires them to be more politically aware as they grow up." Like us on Facebook
